title: [1.6.4/1.7.2/1.7.10][ssp/smp]MoSwords让更多物品变成宝剑！
author: zhangfei
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zhangfei 于 2014-7-13 12:09 编辑 

Mo's Swords!
宝剑大批来袭！


宝剑列表

Cookie SwordCarrot SwordPotato SwordApple SwordPorkchop SwordLicorice SwordBread SwordFish SwordSugar-Cane SwordMelon SwordChicken SwordSteak SwordDrachentoeterIce SwordFire SwordAir SwordEarth SwordBaseball BatPaper SwordDamast GladiusDamastzenerObsidian SwordDemon SwordNinja SwordPirate SaebelCoal SwordBone SwordBrisingrEmerald SwordStichMeter Sword!!!Doubleblade-SwordSlime SwordGolden Apple SwordWasnt me – SwordEnder Sword


大家看一眼就知道是什么宝剑我就不翻译了
根据原作者Nyx的分类：
  Strong Swords  
 Dragonkiller (ultimate sword)
 Fire-sword (place fire and eat cooked pork!)
 Air-sword (lightnings rock!)
 Water-sword (be cool, take this ice)
 Earth-Sword (taste like wood)
 Kibarchi (I'm Arlong, SHAHAHAHAHAHA!!)
 Baseball-Bat-Sword (BONK!)

  Custom Swords  
 Ninja-sword (Hyaaa!!! Custom Iron-sword)
 Pirate-sword (Arrrr!!! Custom Iron-sword)
 Soul-sword (Be a Souuuuulmaaaaan!)
 Paper-sword (Isn't as good as you think!)
 Damast-sword ( It's like a diamond-sword)
 Damast-Gladius (For all the gladiators out there)
 Obsidian Sword (Hard but fair)
 Brisingr (Thank you for 1000 Downloads!!!!)
 Ermarld Sword (Shining bright like a Emerald)
 Bone-Sword (Bone to be wild)
 Coal-Sword (To hot for you)

  Eatable Swords  
 Licorice-Sword (Yummy Yummy Yummy!!!)
 Bread-Sword (EAT THIS, CREEPER!!!)
 Porkchop-sword (Oink?)
 Fish-sword (Really?)
 Sugar-Sword (Merry Christmas!!!)
 Cookie-Sword (Cooookieeeee!!!)
 Steak-Sword (Muh?)
 Chicken-Sword (Without Wings)
 Melon-Sword (Spit the saplings)
 Potato-Sword (We call them "PPatati"
 Carrot-Sword (It's ... soo....orange  )


当然还增加了物品！：

Obsidian IngotFish OelSpezial StickDamastzenersteelDamastzenersteel GlowingDemon GlassCredits Book (Recipes Book)LicoriceMeter Ingo


mod特有的Aura(光环)
Fire AuraAir AuraIce AuraEarth AuraDark Aura


物品合影：






(不知道是我家问题还是论坛问题反正本地图片上传错误没办法只好搬过来网上的了，版主请谅解，等问题解决了一定自己截图)

附送特效图一张：


以下图片属于百度相册类特容易挂，挂了也说一声吧……哎！百度不行了……


 这一眼就能看出来所以我不翻译了 
下载地址……：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1i3Iaj0h
 辛苦搬运……给点金粒吧，人气也要……
